name: Green Thumb (Konner Pierce)
description:
A 5-level precision platformer made in 7 days for a game jam!

This was our first-ever game jam! So we are pretty happy with how it turned out!

Jam Theme: Growth

Credits:

Lead Concept/Programmer: Konner Pierce

Lead Artist: Heaven Rust

Character Designer/Animator: Peyton Mullen

Concept/Level Designer: Nick Lotspeich

Senior Developer/Artist: Tim Cammack

Movement Code Created by: @DawnosaurDev at youtube.com/c/DawnosaurStudios
